page.title: 14News from Creeting St. Mary
page.content: ST. MARY'S CHURCH 1984/5 The parishioners have raised more than 3,000 pounds over the past two years for urgent repairs to the church, especially the roof. FOOTPATH WALK-June 9th, 1985 About 20 people met at Stowmarket for a walk along the Gipping River valley back to Needham Market. LOCAL HISTORY MEETING-June 18th,1985 A Mendlesham farmer, keen on field walking, came to talk on "How to recognize Roman sites". A WALKING TREASURE HUNT-June 22nd,1985 This was an enjoyable evening foll- owing clues, ending with a fish and chip supper at the village hall. PARENT TEACHERS ASSOCIATION-July 6th The latest fund-raising event for the school was a Strawberry Fair, held at the school. Strawberries and cream and a warm, sunny day. Perfect!
